Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_3: You! Woman! Did you see a little girl here?!
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_5: Yeah, she went down there, officer!
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_5_1: She wore a beautiful puffy red dress, a broken trumpet, and has a company of little army of very funny mimes.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_7: Yeah, that's what I definitely could have seen here, if I was capable of seeing little girls...<delay=0.5> </delay>Or anything.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_12: I hope you will. I have some wonderful noodles up here.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_13: Ok. I’m maybe blind, but I’m not deaf, and definitely not stupid. Come out. I don’t bite... At least while you behave yourself
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_14: Why you didn’t told him I’m here?
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_15: I run a noodle shop. They are chasing little girls during the night. Our worldviews can’t be more different.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_16: Do you really made a warmachine in the middle of the city? You can kill somebody you know.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_17: It’s fake. No bullets… I’m… I’m tired of screams.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_18: What a horrible thing to hear from a little girl.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_19: Nobody in command now. I don’t know what to do.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_20: And we should be happy that your your first independent decision was to spare those poor assholes.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_21: Well, for wrong reasons, but we all started somewhere. Here. Your noodles.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_23: I put it on your tab. Eat. It’s a noodle shop after all - you can’t just stay here and not eat.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_24: You know. When I was young I thought that every problem could be solved by hitting somebody with a different amount of force.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_25: I mean, it worked. I would probably continue to do this if I can.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_27: No morals here. I’m not of those folk that teach you how to live.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_28: But I guess you became a little melancholic when you at my age
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_30: Oh, that's the problem. I like it too much. I didn’t expect that I would like something like this.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_32: I’ll return you money when I get them.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_33: The Flying City has felt. It was the end of the war.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_34: Survivals are spread across the continent. Hunted, despised but still dangerous.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_35: Three years later, some of them are working for their hunters. Some are hiding and plan their revenge.
Values.DIALOG_START_GAME_36: Some against all odds kept their freedom to live their own lives.
